description:
This one-day course moves beyond the basics to help you take your web development skills to the next level. Learn how to integrate well-designed themes and templates, build responsive pages that look great on both desktop and mobile, and make the whole thing load faster for your visitors.

  • Responsive design with HTML5 Boilerplate, Initializr, and Bootstrap
  • How to use Themeforest and 99 Designs to make your site look great
  • Web Typography with Google Fonts
  • Intermediate-level styling with CSS
  • Basic uses of JQuery and Javascript
  • Page Speed Optimization
  • Demos of LAMP stack, Meteor.js, and Ruby on Rails
  • Extras: Mailchimp responsive emails, intro to Github Pages and Jekyll, Comments with Facebook and Disqus
title: Front-End Web Development: Getting Responsive with Bootstrap
